utils.db

Class FileStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.db.FileStorage

  • public class FileStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Access to GridFS for records with attached file data

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileStorage.FileData
      Inner class used for passing back the filename along with the input stream when retrieving a file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileStorage() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileStorage.FileData retrieve(MidataId id)
      Returns an input stream from which the file can be read.
      static void store(java.io.InputStream file, MidataId id, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String contentType)
      Stores an input file with GridFS, which automatically divides a file into chunks of 265 kB.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
